name: 2022 6th International Conference on Education and Distance Learning
content: For papers submitted to ICEDL 2022, we offer the publications as following: 1\. Publication in IJIET. Submissions will be peer reviewed by technical program committees, and accepted full papers will be published into International Journal of Information and Education Technology, which will be indexed by Scopus, INSPEC (IET), UGC-CARE List (India), CNKI, EBSCO, Electronic Journals Library, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc. 2\. Publication in IJLT. Submissions will be reviewed by both the conference committees and journal editorial board, and accepted papers will be published in International Journal of Learning and Teaching, which will be indexed by Google Scholar, Crossref, CNKI, etc.
